entry.title: python--æµæ°“è¡¨ç™½ç¥å™¨
entry.content:
æœ€è¿‘åœ¨ã€æŠ–éŸ³ã€‘ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªè§†é¢‘--ä¸€æ¬¾å…³äºå„ç§å‘å°å§å§ğŸ’—è¡¨ç™½ğŸ’—çš„æµæ°“è½¯ä»¶ç¥å™¨ã€‚

#ï¼/usr/bin/env python

-- coding:utf-8 --

author: SueMagic time:2018/7/11

from tkinter import * #all=[a,b]
from PIL import ImageTk, Image

#ä¸»ç•Œé¢å…³é—­çª—å£
def closeWindow():
noclose = Toplevel(window)
noclose.geometry(â€œ300x130+666+290â€)
noclose.title(â€œå˜¿å˜¿â€)
label = Label(noclose, text=â€å†è€ƒè™‘è€ƒè™‘å“¦â€, font=(â€˜å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘â€™, 35))
label.pack()
btn = Button(noclose, text=â€è¡Œâ€, width=20, height=2, command=noclose.destroy)
btn.pack()

#ç‚¹å‡»â€å¯ä»¥â€,å¼¹çª—å£
def Love():

#ä¸€ä¸ªç‹¬ç«‹çš„é¡¶çº§çª—å£love = Toplevel(window)love.geometry ("300x180+666+290")love.title("å¥½å·§")label = Label(love,text = "å¥½å·§ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¹Ÿæ˜¯!!!",font = ('å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘',30))#åŒ…label.pack()label1 = Label(love, text= "ç•™ä¸ªè”ç³»æ–¹å¼å‘—",font=('å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘', 20))label1.pack()entry = Entry (love ,font = ('æ¥·ä½“',15))entry.pack()btn = Button(love,text = "çˆ±ä½ ",width = 10, height = 2,command = bestlove)btn.pack()love.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", closeWindow)

#â€å¯ä»¥â€çš„å…³é—­çª—å£
def closelove():
closelove = Toplevel(window)
closelove.geometry(â€œ300x130+666+290â€)
closelove.title(â€œå˜¿å˜¿â€)
label = Label(closelove, text=â€å˜¿å˜¿ï¼Œæƒ³è·‘ï¼Ÿâ€, font=(â€˜å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘â€™, 35))
label.pack()
btn = Button(closelove, text=â€æ€ä¹ˆå¯èƒ½â€, width=40, height=2, command=closelove.destroy)
btn.pack()

#ç‚¹å‡»â€æ»šâ€,å¼¹çª—å£
def nolove():
no_love = Toplevel(window )
no_love.geometry (â€œ300x100+666+666â€)
no_love.title(â€œå˜¿å˜¿â€)
label = Label(no_love ,text = â€œä½ å†å¥½å¥½æƒ³æƒ³!!!â€,font = (â€˜å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘â€™,25))

#åŒ…label.pack()btn = Button(no_love ,text = "å¥½å§",width = 10, height = 2,command = no_love .destroy)btn.pack()no_love.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", closenolove)

#â€æ»šâ€çš„å…³é—­çª—å£
def closenolove():

#é€’å½’å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆå›è°ƒï¼‰nolove()

#å…³é—­æ‰€æœ‰çª—å£
def closeallwindow():

#é”€æ¯çª—å£window.destroy()

#åˆ›å»ºçª—å£
window = Tk()

#è®¾ç½®çª—å£æ ‡é¢˜

window.title(â€œLoveâ€)

#è®¾ç½®çª—å£å¤§å° å°å†™x
window.geometry(â€œ390x520â€)

#çª—å£ä½ç½®
window.geometry(â€œ+456+169â€)

#çª—å£æ— æ³•å…³é—­
window.protocol(â€œWM_DELETE_WINDOWâ€,closeWindow)

#æ ‡ç­¾æ§ä»¶
label1 = Label(window,text = â€œhey, å°å§å§â€ ,font = (â€˜å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘â€™, 15))

#å®šä½ gridï¼ˆç½‘æ ¼å¼å¸ƒå±€ï¼‰ pack place
label1.grid(row = 0,column = 0,sticky=W)
label2 = Label(window,text = â€œå–œæ¬¢æˆ‘å—?â€ ,font = (â€˜å¾®è½¯é›…é»‘â€™, 45))

#sticky å¯¹å…¶æ–¹æ³• NSWE
label2.grid(row = 1,column = 1,sticky=E)

#æ˜¾ç¤ºå›¾ç‰‡
photo = PhotoImage(file = â€˜./love.pngâ€™)
imageLable = Label(window,image = photo )

#columspan ç»„ä»¶æ‰€è·¨è¶Šçš„åˆ—æ•°
imageLable.grid(row = 2,columnspan = 2 )

#æŒ‰é’®

#command æŒ‰é’®ç‚¹å‡»è§¦å‘çš„äº‹ä»¶
btn1 = Button(window ,text = â€œå¯ä»¥â€,width = 15,height = 2,command = Love)
btn1.grid(row = 3,column = 0, sticky=W)
btn2 = Button(window ,text = â€œæ»šâ€,command = nolove )
btn2.grid(row = 3,column = 1, sticky=E)

#æ˜¾ç¤ºçª—å£ æ¶ˆæ¯å¾ªç¯
window.mainloop()
